_comment: This file is committed to git. All agents see the same rules. Replace [placeholders] when using this template.
instructions: Read CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md before making any changes
Update README status table after changing functionality
Use ./run.sh as entry point, not raw python/docker commands
Commit with conventional commit messages (feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.)
Periodically ask brief alignment questions (one at a time) about what/why/which-repo to ensure critical decisions are covered
Optionally at startup: offer to run ~/Documents/mygit/repo-template/scripts/honest-assessment.sh for no-BS reality check
For bulk refactors (50+ files) or heavy repetitive edits, suggest user consider using another AI tool optimized for speed
For architecture review or edge case discovery, suggest user consider using Gemini for second opinion
At version milestones, request Opus review
For planning new versions or major features, use Opus model
Apply no-regret thinking: prioritize high-impact/low-effort changes, flag surprisingly costly features
